name: Pending Admit
description: Advance notification of a planned admission when patient admission is imminent or reservation exists
businessPurpose: Notify receiving systems of a planned admission to allow preparation for patient arrival
timing: Sent when admission is planned and advance notification is needed for preparation
realWorldScenarios: Emergency department patient awaiting inpatient bed
Scheduled surgery admission planned for next day
Direct admission from physician office scheduled
Transfer patient expected from another facility
Observation patient likely to be admitted
Pre-operative admission planned for same-day surgery

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Medium - planning data may be tentative but should include expected timing
